name: pnp-remove-pending-api-permission-requests
title: Remove pending SharePoint API permission requests
shortDescription: This script helps you to quickly remove pending SharePoint API permission requests.
longDescription: When building SharePoint Framework solutions connected to APIs secured with Azure Active Directory,  you'll easily end up with many pending permission requests. This script helps you to quickly remove pending SharePoint API permission requests.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
